app.name: All API Hub
app.description: Manage AI relays and your accounts and balances in one place

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.warning: You are about to delete account {{accountName}}. Please verify before confirming to delete this account
delete.noResponse: Delete operation did not return successfully

tempWindowFallbackReminder.title: Enable temporary window mode for requests
tempWindowFallbackReminder.titleTempWindowOnly: Enable temporary window mode for requests
tempWindowFallbackReminder.descriptionDisabled: {{accountName}} needs a temporary popup window to open and pass protection so requests can complete successfully. Enable it in Settings > Data Refresh
tempWindowFallbackReminder.descriptionDisabledTempWindowOnly: {{accountName}} needs a temporary popup window to open and pass protection so requests can complete successfully. Enable it in Settings > Data Refresh
tempWindowFallbackReminder.descriptionDisabledWithCookieInterceptor: {{accountName}} needs the protection-bypass flow on Firefox. A temporary popup window will open to obtain cookies, and Cookie Interceptor will attach them to requests. Enable it in Settings > Data Refresh
tempWindowFallbackReminder.descriptionPermission: {{accountName}} needs Cookie Interceptor permission so the temporary popup window can open and requests can complete successfully. Grant it in Settings > Permissions
tempWindowFallbackReminder.descriptionPermissionTempWindowOnly: {{accountName}} needs permission to open a temporary popup window so requests can complete successfully. Grant it in Settings > Permissions
tempWindowFallbackReminder.descriptionPermissionWithCookieIntercept: {{accountName}} needs Cookie Interceptor permissions on Firefox. The temporary popup window must open to obtain cookies, and requests will attach them. Grant it in Settings > Permissions

ccswitch.title: Export to CC Switch
ccswitch.description: Send this provider configuration directly to CC Switch via deep link

claudeCodeRouter.title: Import to Claude Code Router
claudeCodeRouter.description: Create or update a provider in Claude Code Router. Models are required.

descriptions.providerApiBaseUrl: This should be the full /v1/chat/completions endpoint.
descriptions.models: Enter one model per line or separate by commas.
descriptions.restartAfterSave: Router may require restart for config changes to take effect.

firefox.popupLimitation: This feature cannot be used normally in the popup of Firefox browser. Please use the sidebar mode to add accounts
firefox.sidebarInstruction: Click on the extension icon in the browser toolbar, then select the 'Sidebar' option to open the sidebar mode

multiSelect.noOptionsAllowCustom: No options available. Type to create one
